scriptItem.label: filecache_parent_this
ikoon_qq_expand
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_ui reload(wf_network_ui) parm_code = kwargs["parms"][0] node = parm_code.node() wf_network_ui.qq_expand(node,parm_code)

scriptItem.label: ikoon_ui_generate
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_ui reload(wf_network_ui) parm_code = kwargs["parms"][0] node = parm_code.node() wf_network_ui.parm_generate(node,parm_code)

scriptItem.label: ikoon.parm.PREview
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_kwargs reload(wf_network_kwargs) parms = kwargs['parms'] node_app = parms[0].node() wf_network_kwargs.parmmenu_pre (node_app, parms)

scriptItem.label: ikoon.parm.REF.peer

scriptItem.label: ikoon.parm.find
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_utils reload(wf_network_utils) parms = kwargs['parms'] parm = parms[0] wf_network_utils.find_parm(parm.name())

scriptItem.label: ikoon.parm.go
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_utils reload(wf_network_utils) parms = kwargs['parms'] parm = parms[0] node = parm.node() wf_network_utils.go_parm(node,parm)

scriptItem.label: ikoon.parm.round
scriptItem.scriptCode: import wf_network_utils reload(wf_network_utils) parms = kwargs['parms'] wf_network_utils.parm_round(parms)
